items.sentence: After supper, I always find myself falling asleep.
Tom told me that the door was open, but it wasn't.
Keeping this museum open is the right thing to do.
Tom pushed the door open and entered the building.
There is an open-air market not too far from here.
It would probably be a good idea to do that today.
I told them that I couldn't work because I'm sick.
Promise not to forget about the good times we had.
Tom couldn't look at the photo without tearing up.
Tom summoned up enough courage to ask for a raise.
